name: Medarot Dual: Kuwagata Ver.
overview: An arena-action spinoff of the Medabots series. You play as a young boy or girl recruited to work as an official Medarotter for the MMF (Medarot Mission Force). The MMF is an organization separate from the Select Force that accepts requests from the public to solve Medarot-related problems. As one of their specialist Medarotters, you complete these requests in the form of missions.
